description: A collection of circles in a large rectangular formation with a triangular formation extending upwards from the top right corner and three circles to the left of the triangular formation that form a sparser triangular formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a small, bright blue triangle toward the top left corner of the rectangular formation and a light orange triangle toward the top right corner.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.

user.name: VertexArchive
